changeSet.author: edapper
changeSet.sql: IF NOT EXISTS ( SELECT * FROM sys.columns WHERE object_id = OBJECT_ID(N'[dbo].[Item]') AND name = 'vlMinimo' ) BEGIN ALTER TABLE Item ADD vlMinimo DECIMAL(9,2) NULL; END

rollback.sql: IF EXISTS ( SELECT * FROM sys.columns WHERE object_id = OBJECT_ID(N'[dbo].[Item]') AND name = 'vlMinimo' ) BEGIN ALTER TABLE Item DROP COLUMN vlMinimo; END
